# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and unmatched quality, it's truly a game-changer in its category. For this remarkable piece, I propose a price of $200. This investment is sure to provide you with significant benefits and value over time. I believe you'll find it worth every penny. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
